field.description: Customization of this site based upon your geographical or cultural region
Unique identifier of a user account for this site
Secret sequence of characters required for access to this site
field.comment: A password is personal, and must be at least 6 characters long to be valid

field.full-name: User Account Enable auto log in
field.description: Automatically signs you in next time you connect to this server
field.comment: This option should be used only if you are not using a public computer

field.description: Current secret sequence of characters required for access to this site
field.comment: A password is personal, and must be at least 6 characters long to be valid

field.description: New secret sequence of characters required for access to this site
field.comment: A password is personal, and must be at least 6 characters long to be valid

field.description: New secret sequence of characters required for access to this site
The name that stands first in a full name
Name of the match
Detailed description or preview of the match
Word or expression used
The name that stands last in a full name
field.comment: The last name is also called surname

field.description: Detailed explanation of a word or expression
Name of the screen, as displayed in the header
Detailed explanation of the function of the screen
Mailbox used to send and receive electronic messages
field.comment: This mailbox is the recipient of system notifications and subscriptions

field.description: Permanent postal address
Permanent postal address (line 2)
Permanent postal address (line 3)
Permanent postal address (line 4)
Number that identifies each postal delivery area
Municipality associated with the postal delivery area
Constituent unit of the United States or Canada
Office phone number of a person
field.comment: This number should include the extension when applicable

field.description: Land or territory name
Secret sequence of characters required for access to this site
Initial of the middle name
Index number of the results page to display
Displays all results in one page as opposed to several
Maximum number of records per page
Export format of the results to be used by another application
Column to sort the results by
To search this site, enter a keyword (at least 2 characters) and press Enter
field.comment: This search applies to all content, not only static content, but dynamic content as well

field.description: Significant word used as an index to content (at least 2 characters)
field.comment: If two keywords are entered, the results matching both keywords will be listed first

field.description: Category of material being searched for
field.comment: Several types of content can be selected for searching

field.description: Column to sort the results by
Minimum inactivity time span before a user's authentication expires
field.comment: Default session time out is 30 minutes

field.description: Fax number of a person
field.comment: This number should include the extension when applicable

field.full-name: User Account Company Cell Phone Number
field.description: Company cell phone number of a person
field.comment: This number should include the extension when applicable

field.description: Generic job description
Eliminates the results not containing all keywords entered
field.comment: When this option is not checked, all results matching at least one of the keywords are listed

field.description: Country where a user resides
Full name, first name, last name or login of a user account
Unique identifier of a person, as assigned by the country of residence
Main phone number of a person
Alternative phone number of a person
Pager number of a person
Home phone number of a person
Building of a person, specified by a town abbreviation and a building name when applicable
Room of a person in the specified building
Department of a person
Master organizational entity
User account to use as template to populate fields that are not in this form
A face picture of the person associated with an account
Name of a department, as defined by Human Resources
Person responsible for a department
Name of a building
Name of a company
Unique internal identifier representing the organizational unit of an account in Active Directory
Unique internal identifier representing the domain of an account in Active Directory
Unique identifier of a user account as defined by Human Resources
Type of a user account as defined by Human Resources, such as Employee, Contractor, Client or Partner
Team of a user account as reported by its supervisor
Indicates whether an account is enabled or disabled
Date an account is set to expire
Number of times an account has logged to the domain server queried by this application
Last date a password has been set for an account
Number of times an incorrect password has been entered since the last successful logon for an account
Last time an incorrect password has been entered for an account
Last date an account has logged on to the server queried by this application
Name of the server where the directory containing this account is being queried
Last date an account has logged on to the domain queried by this application
Internal unique name of an account
All proxy addresses of an account
All legacy exchange distinguished names of an account
All show in address books of an account
All target addresses of an account
Description of an account
Personal assistant of an account
Phone number of an assistant of an account

field.full-name: Account Expire this user's password now
field.description: Indicates whether the password of this user should be expired immediately
Indicates whether communicator archiving is enabled for an account
Communicator option flags associated with an account
Communicator primary home server associated with an account
Communicator primary user address associated with an account
Communicator user enabled associated with an account
Logon script associated with an account
Content of a warning message
Start time of a warning
End time of a warning
Name of a data source
Type of a data source
Connection URL of a data source
Stack traced of an error log
Command line of the batch being executed
Date a batch was last reported to start
Date a batch was last reported to end
Subject of an email
Body of an email
Sender of an email
Recipient of an email
Carbon copy recipient of an email
Date an email is scheduled to be sent
Status of an email
A global role assigned to an account
A global role assigned to an group
An entity id assigned to a log
A record id assigned to a log
Date a log is created in the database
A type id assigned to a log
A client address assigned to an entry log
A server address assigned to an entry log
A session id assigned to an entry log
An actual account id assigned to an entry log
A proxy account id assigned to an entry log
Date that begins for searching a log
Date that ends for searching a log
A class name assigned to an error log
A page id assigned to a response log
Time taken by completing a response log
A code assigned to a response log
Minimum time taken by completing a response log
Maximum time taken by completing a response log
Name of a file
Amount of disk space taken by a resource file
field.comment: Size is expressed in bytes

field.description: Date a file is uploaded to database
A global role assigned to a file
A rganizational unit assigned to a LDAP control
A global role assigned to a LDAP control
Upload date that begins for searching a file
Upload date that ends for searching a file
Minimum file size for searching a file
Maximum file size for searching a file
A domain assigned to a LDAP control
A stored file
Full name, including the first name, the middle initial, and the last name
field.comment: When the last name is unknown, the login is used instead

field.description: User acting as functional manager of another user
Name of a user group
Indicates whether the grantee should receive a copy of all automated emails received by the grantor
Group to copy initial memberships from
field.comment: After a group has been cloned, modifying the memberships of the original group will not affect the memberships of the cloned group

field.description: Indicates whether the grantee should be able to access items you cannot modify
field.comment: By default, proxies are entered only to allow another person to perform your transactions. This option extends the proxy by allowing the grantee to have read-access to all your resources, including sensitive resources that you do not own or manage but that you have read-access to

field.description: User group assigned to a person
User groups assigned to a person
User group to use as template to populate fields that are not in this form
Description of a user group
Name assigned to the responsibility or duty
Complete description of the role, including duties and responsibilities
Name assigned to the right or advantage
Complete description of the privilege
Person responsible for keeping the members of a user group up-to-date
Type of a user group, public or personal
Name or description of a user group
Person belonging to a user group
Persons belonging to a user group
Person granting its transaction privileges to another person
Person receiving transaction privileges from another person
Name of a piece of content, to be used for searches
Article where a piece of content is accessible from
field.comment: A piece of content can reside in multiple articles. The article where a piece of content is also maintained from is the main parent article

field.description: Person who submitted a content request
field.comment: Any user can submit a content request

field.description: Person who is responsible for approving a content request
field.comment: This person is usually the editor of the parent article

field.description: Type of modification requested by the user
field.comment: A user can request a piece of content to be added, updated or removed from an article

field.description: Indicator of the actions left to be performed with a content request
field.comment: The four statuses of a content request are "pending", "approved", "rejected" and "cancelled"

field.description: Existing content to be added to an article as a reference
field.comment: Adding a piece of content as a reference does not transfer any responsibility associated with the content

field.description: Type of a piece of content
field.comment: Available content types are: Article, Image. References are used when the same content is available from different articles

field.description: Date a piece of content was created
Date a piece of content was last changed
field.comment: An article is considered modified only if its body has been modified. An image is considered modified only if a new file has been uploaded. Other changes do not impact this date

field.description: Amount of disk space taken by an image file
field.comment: Size is expressed in Kilobytes or Megabytes. 1 Megabyte represents about 1000 Kilobytes

field.description: Description of a piece of content, to be used for searches
field.comment: It might also contain any information relevant to the end user

field.description: Number of articles or images related to an article
field.comment: Sub-Related content is not counted

field.description: Address to type in your browser to download or view a piece of content
field.comment: This address usually starts with http://

field.description: Address to type in your browser to view the properties of a piece of content
field.comment: This address usually starts with http://

field.description: Security restrictions associated with a piece of content
Internal unique identifier of a piece of content
field.comment: The identifier of a piece of content is assigned when this content is published to the wiki

field.description: Date a content request was submitted
Date a content request was last changed
Variant number of an article
Variant number of an image
Day a piece of content was accessed
Person responsible for the content of an article and all associated content
field.comment: This person must ensure all content is ready for publication, including conformity with standards. The editor must also ensure that the content is relevant and up-to-date

field.description: Number of times a piece of content was accessed during a day
Relative standing of a piece of content during a day
field.comment: Ranks are computed independently for each content type (article or image)

field.description: Word in the name or description of a piece of content
field.comment: 1 character words are ignored in searches

field.description: Date a piece of content was created
Date a piece of content was created
Date a piece of content was last changed
field.comment: An article is considered modified only if its body has been modified. An image is considered modified only if a new file has been uploaded. Other changes do not impact this date

field.description: Date a piece of content was last changed
field.comment: An article is considered modified only if its body has been modified. An image is considered modified only if a new file has been uploaded. Other changes do not impact this date

field.description: Recipient to send a notification to when a new version of a piece of content is issued
Group of users having the same editing privileges as the editor
Frequency of the email notifications to be sent, immediate, daily digest or weekly digest
field.comment: Digest notifications are compiled to minimize the number of emails received by the subscriber

field.description: Person who originated the content but not necessarily entered it into this application
field.comment: This person is an alternate point of contact for the material

field.description: Type of subscription, individual or group
Last time the subscriber was logged in and accessed the content
field.comment: This date represents the last time the content was accessed by a subscriber only if access to the content required authentication

field.description: Individual or group subscriber
field.comment: When an account is both an individual and a group subscriber of a piece of content, two notifications are sent

field.description: Frequency of the email notifications received, immediate, daily or weekly

field.contextual-name: Deny access to the members of this group
field.full-name: Deny access to the members of this group
field.description: When checked, this option prevents the members of an access group from accessing the content
Comment specific to a particular version of a piece of content
Indicates whether all authenticated users can submit content requests
Person who entered the new version of an article
Person who uploaded the new version of an image
Suffix of the easy-to-remember address of a piece of content. Prefix is https://www.corendal.com/wiki/something/goto/ for articles and https://www.corendal.com/wiki/something/gotoimage/ for images
field.comment: Friendly addresses must be unique within all wiki. Assign friendly addresses to content you want to advertise in internal business presentations

field.description: Applies the requested change to the wiki without submitting a content request for approval
field.comment: You can add immediately a piece of content only if you are the registered editor of the article where the content will reside

field.description: Actual content article, as stored on disk
Main content of an article
field.comment: The content of an article is entered through a rich text editor and is saved in the HTML format

field.description: Sequence of articles to browse in order to access a piece of content
field.comment: As a piece of content can reside in multiple articles, a piece of content can have several paths
